parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to include in the response

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items to include in a page. Value must be an integer between 1 and 1000. Only one of pageSize or pageToken can be specified.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Page offset descriptor. Valid page tokens are included in the response. Only one of pageSize or pageToken can be specified.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specifies the order to include list items as "_{fieldName}_ [asc|desc]". The second field is optional and specifies the sort direction ("asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending).

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.description: Creates a new workflow and version (if provided).

201.description: Details of the newly created workflow.

409.description: A conflict was found. Ensure the workflow name is unique.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

404.description: The workflow with the specified ID was not found.

get.summary: Get the details of a workflow version

parameters.description: ID of the workflow

parameters.name: versionName
parameters.description: Name of the workflow version

404.description: The workflow ID or version name was not found.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

patch.description: Updates an existing workflow version. Note: The Version, Definition, and Status cannot be changed simultaneously. Only one of these can be changed per API call.

parameters.name: workflowId
parameters.description: ID of the workflow

parameters.name: versionName
parameters.description: Name of the workflow version

200.description: Details of the created workflow run.

404.description: The workflow ID or version name was not found.

409.description: A conflict was found. Ensure the workflow version name is unique.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

CreateWorkflowRequest.description: Create a workflow and optional version

status.description: Published Status of the workflow version

CreateWorkflowVersionRequest.description: Create a new workflow version under an existing workflow root

error.description: Externally provided Error of a signalling action.

cause.description: Externally provided Cause of a failed signalling action.

input.description: Input for the launched workflow run. Must resolve to a JSON object.

engineParameters.description: Runtime options for launching workflows (currently only used for Airflow     and otherwise ignored). Must resolve to a JSON object.

result.description: External result of a successful signal. Must resolve to a JSON value.

UpdateWorkflowVersionRequest.description: Update a workflow version definition using patch semantics

categories.description: Categories of the workflow (Limit Max Size : 10)

createdByClientId.description: Client ID of the Origin Request

timeCreated.description: Time (in UTC) the resource was created

timeModified.description: Time (in UTC) the resource was modified

tenantId.description: Tenant ID the resource belongs to

acl.description: Access control list of the resource

value.description: A simple string value for the argument. Cannot provide both Value and Json at the same time.

json.description: A JSON value for the argument. Cannot provide both Value and Json at the same time.

options.description:
Comma separated list of options for the argument: Required, Overridable, Writable, Json, Optional, ReadOnly, Final
Some combinations of options are considered errors, like Required/Optional, Overridable/Final, Writable/ReadOnly, etc.

categories.description: Categories of the workflow (Limit Max Size : 10)

createdByClientId.description: Client ID of the Origin Request

timeCreated.description: Time (in UTC) the resource was created

timeModified.description: Time (in UTC) the resource was modified

tenantId.description: Tenant ID the resource belongs to

acl.description: Access control list of the resource

type.description: Type of the connection: PlatformJwt, ApiBearerToken, AwsCredentials, ApiCustomAuthentication, BsshOAuthV2

host.description: For API based connections, the Host part of the API endpoint

hostValidationRegex.description: Regex that hosts associated with this connection must meet (when host override by each run is allowed)

credentials.description: Credentials associated with the connection. Format depends on type of connection.

options.description: Comma separated list of options associated with the connection: CredentialsRequired, AllowCredentialsOverride, AutoDisableCredentialsAfterUse, AllowHostOverride

autoDisableUrl.description: Relative URL (relative to Host) to call in order to disable the credentials

autoDisableHttpMethod.description: Http method to use to disable the credentials. Must be POST, PUT or DELETE

WorkflowConnection.description: Defines a connection that can be used in a workflow definition to perform actions

name.description: The name of the workflow language

version.description: The version of the workflow language, if any

WorkflowLanguage.description: Language details about a workflow version

itemCount.description: Number of items included in the page

nextPageToken.description: PageToken for the next paged list

prevPageToken.description: PageToken for the previous paged list

lastPageToken.description: PageToken for the last paged list. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

totalItemCount.description: Total number of items in all pages. Only included when requested

totalPageCount.description: Total number of pages. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

timeStarted.description: The time (in UTC) the workflow run started

timeStopped.description: The time (in UTC) the Workflow Run stopped

error.description: Error for a failed workflow run

errorCause.description: Error cause for a failed workflow run

input.description: Input to workflow run, as JSON

output.description: Output from workflow run, as JSON
